Description: Postcard; printed paper; monochrome (black and white) photograph showing the Arabian Bazar near Fort-Napolean at Alexandria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used. Message reads: "15/3/16 Sidi Bishr. My dearest Florrie, As there is a mail out tomorrow I am sending you a few pcs [postcards]. Mr Nash who used to live next door to us in Ashmore Road is out here at Mustapha & gave me a ... tonight. He told me such a tale about mother worrying about me - I do hope it isn't true. Why didn't you tell me, dear, if it ...". The message continued on another card.
